text: The 1997 Qatar Crown Prince Cup was the 3rd edition of this cup tournament in men's football (soccer). It was played by the top 4 teams of the Q-League. Al- Arabi were crowned champions for the first time. It was the first tournament that saw the final go to penalties to decide the champion. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- !1997 Qatar Crown Prince Cup Winners |- | Al-Arabi 1st Title |} Category:Qatar Crown Prince Cup Category:1996–97 in Qatari football
title: 1997 Qatar Crown Prince Cup
